subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Flyers, whose goaltenders struggled in the playoffs, acquired the negotiating rights to the free-agent goalie Ilya Bryzgalov from the Phoenix Coyotes.
snippet: The Philadelphia Flyers, whose goaltenders struggled in the playoffs, acquired the negotiating rights to the free-agent goalie Ilya Bryzgalov from the Phoenix Coyotes.
